Content.Title: Settings Menu
Text: You can open the settings menu by clicking Edit->Settings or pressing Ctrl+T. Here you can change the current maze's width and height. You can also change the current creator's tile size (The size of the tiles in the maze creator).

Content.Title: Exit Tool

Images.Alt: Gif of Changing the exit in a grid.

Text: You can change the tile that is the exit of the maze by Ctrl+Clicking the new tile to be the exit (Or by entering exit mode by clicking Edit->Change Exit then clicking the tile to set as the new exit).

Content.Title: Entrance Tool

Images.Alt: Gif of Changing the entrance in a grid.

Text: You can change the tile that is the entrance of the maze by Alt+Clicking the new tile to be the exit (Or by entering entrance mode by clicking Edit->Change Entrance then clicking the tile to set as the new entrance).
